title: pix_info
description: The `pix_info` object retrieves metadata about the current image in GEM, such as its dimensions, pixel size, color space (format), and a pointer to the image data. It can operate in a default "raw" mode with multiple outlets or a "message" mode (activated by the `-m` flag) that outputs all information as a series of messages. Users can also request symbolic representation of OpenGL format constants.
